Message.Title: what the frig?
Message.Msg: why is ebay down so strongly today? It's as though some news came out against it-even though I don't see any. Figures, when I decide to go long on it, that's when it tanks....

Message.Title: Pay Me Later - sleaze balls. ** Never Use It **
Message.Msg: Bought $70/- worth of item from ebay. 2 Months later - got a bill from Pay Me Later - with $25 + $35 late fees. Plus $4 in interest charges. Paid $134/- called them and ask them to waive atleast one of the late fees and they refuse to do so. Bunch of sleaze balls - stay away -

Message.Title: Important Info in PLSB
Message.Msg: PLSB has been on the uptrend from .40-70 and is looking to really catch steam. I'm initiating a long position as they are a LEGITIMATE company with good #'s. There have been buyout talks and its one year Target has been set at $4-5.
